servinfo.title: Headlight Auto Leveling System Symptom Diagnosis (If Equipped)

condition.ptxt: Headlight auto leveling warning light comes on steady

action.ptxt: Check height sensor referring to Height Sensor and Its Circuit Inspection (If Equipped) .

ps.ptxt: Headlight auto leveling control module faulty

action.ptxt: Check headlight auto leveling control module for function referring to Inspection of Headlight Auto Leveling Control Module and Its Circuit (With Headlight Auto Leveling System) .

condition.ptxt: Optical axes of both headlights do not change

action.ptxt: Replace fuse and check for short circuit.

ps.ptxt: Supply voltage too low or too high

action.ptxt: Check charging system referring to Generator Test:J24B and N32A / Generator Test (Undercharged Battery Check):M16A and J20A / Generator Test (Undercharged Battery Check):F9Q or Generator Test (Overcharged Battery Check):M16A and J20A / Generator Test (Overcharged Battery Check):F9Q .

ps.ptxt: Headlight auto leveling control module faulty

action.ptxt: Check headlight auto leveling control module for function referring to Inspection of Headlight Auto Leveling Control Module and Its Circuit (With Headlight Auto Leveling System) .

condition.ptxt: Optical axis of only one headlight does not change

action.ptxt: Check actuator referring to Headlight Leveling Actuator Inspection (If Equipped) .
